concept.title: Configuring protocol plug-ins
concept.shortdesc: The protocol plug-in provides the ability to extend the protocols that are supported by the appliance. You can configure protocol plug-ins by using the command line.

conbody.p: You can use protocol plug-ins to add industry-specific messaging protocols to in a controlled way that does not compromise the security of the appliance environment. The protocol plug-in can also support legacy sensors that are not able to change to MQTT.
The protocol plug-in facility is not available in high availability environments.
